pageContext.description: High flat ridge which disappears towards the point. "Fish tail" hilt plate, flanged and grooved. 9 Rivet holes, one of which is filled up. Faint bevel round cutting edge. The wooden boss of the hilt pommel found with this sword, is of oval outline, and the convex face is decorated with 7 lateral flutings.
pageContext.patina: A little black or grey, but bright metal nearly all over.
pageContext.surface: Fairly smooth. Many shallow irregular lines on the blade near the point.
pageContext.collection: Museum of Archaeology + Ethnology, Cambridge,No. 186, Murray Collection
